vclaim: Donald Trump predicted that Osama bin Laden would attack the U.S. in his 2000 book, 'The America We Deserve.'
title: Did Donald Trump Predict Osama bin Laden Would Attack the US?
subtitle: President Trump mentioned Osama bin Laden in his 2000 book "The America We Deserve," but he didn't predict the terrorist leader would attack the United States.
author: Dan Evon
